description:
~* Enumerate Race For Free *~

It is an excellent application for kids to have fun with math and at the same time learn addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Enumerate Race is "your ultimate babysitter" since it engages kids while driving, riding a train or waiting in line.

Simple and colorful design enhances the attraction of kids towards the game meanwhile increasing their capabilities of Arithmetic operations
